mapper.select: select t.table_name tablename,nvl(f.comments,t.table_name) comments from user_tables t inner join user_tab_comments f on t.table_name=f.table_name

select t.column_name field,t.Data_type type,nvl(a.comments,t.column_name) comments from user_tab_columns t join user_col_comments a on t.TABLE_NAME =a.TABLE_NAME and t.column_name = a.COLUMN_NAME and t.table_name=#{tablename}

select
${field}
from ${tablename}
${condition.field} ${condition.symbol}
'%${condition.textvalue}%' '${condition.textvalue}'
(${condition.field}>#{condition.numvalue1} and ${condition.field}<#{condition.numvalue2})
(${condition.field}>#{condition.numvalue1} and ${condition.field}<=#{condition.numvalue2})
(${condition.field}>=#{condition.numvalue1} and ${condition.field}< #{condition.numvalue2})
(${condition.field}>= #{condition.numvalue1} and ${condition.field}<=#{condition.numvalue2})
${condition.field} ${condition.symbol} ${condition.numvalue1}
(${condition.field}>to_date(#{condition.datevalue1},'${condition.dateformat}') and ${condition.field}< to_date(#{condition.datevalue2},'${condition.dateformat}'))
(${condition.field}>to_date(#{condition.datevalue1},'${condition.dateformat}') and ${condition.field}<= to_date(#{condition.datevalue2},'${condition.dateformat}'))
(${condition.field}>=to_date(#{condition.datevalue1},'${condition.dateformat}') and ${condition.field}<to_date(#{condition.datevalue2},'${condition.dateformat}'))
(${condition.field}>=to_date(#{condition.datevalue1},'${condition.dateformat}') and ${condition.field}<= to_date(#{condition.datevalue2},'${condition.dateformat}'))
${condition.field} ${condition.symbol} to_date(#{condition.datevalue1},'${condition.dateformat}')
order by
${rank.field} ${rank.type}
